scripts.start: npm run copyToDist:frontend && npm run dev:once && npm-run-all --parallel watch:sync server
scripts.copyToDist:frontend: xcopy frontend\src\images frontend\dist\images /E /I /Y && xcopy frontend\src\styles frontend\dist\styles /E /I /Y && copy frontend\src\index.html frontend\dist\index.html /Y
scripts.sync: xcopy frontend\dist\index.html frontend\src\index.html /Y && xcopy frontend\dist\styles frontend\src\styles /E /I /Y && xcopy frontend\dist\images frontend\src\images /E /I /Y
